about_the_game:
This downloadable soundtrack includes all 80 tracks from Rainbow Billy: The Curse of The Leviathan, composed, performed and produced by Antoine Vachon and more than a dozen talented musicians.
The first 39 tracks are designed as a listening experience reflecting Billy's journey through the video game. The remaining 41 tracks are bonus tracks, cutscene scoring and alternate versions.
A PDF format booklet has been included for full credits, lyrics and creators notes.
We hope you enjoy listening to Billy's musical journey!
